explains: adj. 不用的；从未用过的

sentences.en: To compound the delays, the unused airport is resulting in massive costs.
sentences.cn: 除了延迟之外更糟糕的是，闲置的机场带来了巨大的损失。

sentences.en: They had been hid in the unused gallery listening to their own funeral sermon!
sentences.cn: 他们一直躲在闲置的走廊里，听着自己的葬礼布道！

sentences.en: The suggested theory is that a plant community becomes more susceptible to invasion whenever there is an increase in the amount of unused resources.
sentences.cn: 提出的理论是，当未利用资源数量增加时，植物群落更容易受到入侵。
